title: Textile, 600–300 BC
medium:
Medium: Cotton, wool
Technique: supplementary sets, reinforced tapestry, with looping; stem stitch on plain weave interlooped fringe; embroidered
description: Fragment with highly stylized animals (puma) in opposite direction and part of a human figure. Light red, yellow, green and blue on reddish-brown background. Fringes on lower part of fragment. Knit border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 600–300 BC. Medium: Cotton, wool
Technique: supplementary sets, reinforced tapestry, with looping; stem stitch on plain weave interlooped fringe; embroidered. 1949-118-2.
